DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Odense University Hospital ( OUH ) collaboration Institute Clinical Biomechanics Sport Science , University Southern Denmark Clinical Institute , University Southern Denmark Aim : To evaluate effect implant design postoperative total leg muscle function recovery gait hip replacement patient . Design : A prospective randomized control clinical trial patient randomize ( A ) total hip arthroplasty surgery ( THA ) ( B ) resurface total hip replacement surgery ( RTHA ) . Pre-surgery assessment follow-up conduct 8 , 26 52 wks post-surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Gait Analysis Neuromuscular Function After Primary Total Hip Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: The project consist three substudies : - Determination test-retest reliability agreement specific mechanical muscle function variables patient interest . - Evaluate effect implant design postoperative mechanical muscle recovery - Evaluate effect implant design postoperative gait
DOC.criteria: Primary arthrosis Osteoporosis , ( Tscore < 2.5 SD ) proximal femur BMI > 35 Severe acetabulum dysplasia ( AP centre edge < 1520° ) Femur anteversion > 25° Severe caput deformity Leg length discrepancy > 1 cm Offset problem Earlier fracture ipsilateral proximal femur Rheumatoid arthritis Neuromuscular vascular disease
